courseDetails.title: Practical Japanese Conversation For Travelling Japan 1
courseDetails.shortDescription: Vehicle Edition - Elementary Level
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this video course, 2 Japanese tutors Natsuko and Asari will be guiding you to help you improve your Japanese conversation skills that will be useful especially when you travel Japan. It means that you will be focusing to gain your speaking and listening skills.


The course is for 1 hour and 40 mins in total and there are 11 lessons including 3 small tests and 1 final test to check if you gain the useful knowledge you learn during the course. 1 lesson is approximately for 10 to 15 mins and it is easy to study at your own pace.


Please note that this video course is for elementary level which means that you have already gained basic knowledge of Japanese such as being able to read Hiragana & Katakana (not necessary but preferable), and understanding numbers, greeting phrases and some simple vocabulary at least before starting this course. If you haven’t already, please check out the video course ‘Learn Japanese For Beginners With Natsuko’.


Practical Japanese Conversation For Travelling Japan 1

Course Contents:


[Section 1: Basic Knowledge]

  Lesson 1: Words For Directions

  Lesson 2: Traffic Words

  Lesson 3: How To Explain The Way

  Lesson 4: Small Test 1


[Section 2: When You Use Taxis]

  Lesson 5: How To Catch A Taxi

  Lesson 6: How To Tell A Taxi Driver Where You Want To Go

  Lesson 7: Small Test 2


[Section 3: When You Use Trains And Buses]

  Lesson 8: How To Go To A Train Station

  Lesson 9: How To Go To A Bus Stop

  Lesson 10: Small Test 3


[Section 4: Final Test]

  Lesson 11: Final Test

  Answers and listening scripts for Final Test are included in PDF file

courseDetails.title: Introduction to the language of tax
courseDetails.shortDescription: basic terminology and concepts related to the area of tax law
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you find yourself stuck when reading a legal text on tax law due to the language used? Are you confused or feel lost when listening to native English speakers discuss a tax issue due to the complexity of the terminology?

This course is intended for anyone either studying or working in some capacity in the field of tax law (and particularly for non-native English speakers). It introduces students (or provides a good review for those already with some knowledge) to key vocabulary, concepts, collocations and prepositions in the area of tax law. It can also be a good introduction to the world of tax law for those with no background  in that field whatsoever.

The focus of the course is on key terminology, collocations, prepositions and reading/listening comprehension based on current global tax issues.  By the end of the course, you should have the basics of the language of tax law to be able to understand and communicate with others smoothly and accurately.

You will learn key terminology related to both personal taxation; corporate taxation; VAT or GST terminology; audit terminology, etc. You will perfect your reading comprehension skills based on a VAT related reading based on the UK Tax Code. Similarly, you will also perfect your listening / video comprehension skills based on two videos dealing with current global controversial tax issues: the first one relating to Amazon's corporate taxation issues and the second related to Apple's corporate taxation battle with the European Union.

This mini course is not intended to go in-depth into any of the above mentioned tax related areas and issues, but rather, provide you with the very basics to be able to speak, read and understand content related to basic tax.

The approach is rather practical with an introductory session of approx. 80 minutes accompanied by a pdf script of everything said in the video along with key exercises in order to put the theory into practice. All the materials mentioned in the video are attached as resources in each of the 5 Lectures.

Feel also free to leave your comments and thoughts related to the tax issues raised in the course, particularly in the two video comprehension excercises on the course forum.
targetAudiences: The course is intended for both business and legal professionals as well as university or college students seeking to expand or check their knowledge in the area of basic tax

courseDetails.title: Overcome Your Fear of Rejection... Permanently!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Build new relationships. Go for what you want. Overcome your rejection fears and speak to anyone with confidence!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you terrified of rejection? Do you feel like you’re missing out on massive life opportunities? Learn how to stop fearing rejection, raise your self-confidence, and easily handle being told “No”.

Most people miss out on the life they deserve because they're simply too afraid to ask for what they want.

Instead of reaching for the things you truly desire, you get stuck with the same unsatisfying job, love life, friend circle, and lack of self-confidence. But it doesn’t have to be that way.

Our fear of rejection is usually the single greatest barrier to a better life.

Yet the fear of rejection simply doesn't make rational sense. Once you understand this, you can start developing the tools and mindset to beat it.


In this course, you’ll learn how to:

  • Overcome the nervousness that gets in the way of asking for what you want

  • Easily handle being told “No” without getting hurt

  • Grow your self-confidence by changing your perspective on rejection


We’ll break down why Rejection is something you can manage. Something that’s painless. Something that can be overcome.

You’ll walk away with all the tools needed to start forming great romances, find a rewarding career, and boost your self-confidence in every situation.


“If you’re serious about changing your life, and overcoming your fears of rejection, you got what you need to start in this course.”

  • Rod Katsumata


Dealing with rejection isn’t about manipulating others into saying “Yes”. It’s about learning how to handle it when they don’t.

Once you stop worrying about the outcome of your question, you’ll feel confident and prepared to ask for what you want directly all the time.

Go for what you want without hesitation. Give yourself the life you deserve.

Avoiding rejection is not what moves you forward in life. You must face your fear and overcome it. And the first step to overcoming is understanding.

We’ll get right to the heart of what “Rejection” really means, how it affects our behaviour, and what you can do to stop it ruling your life.

If you apply the principles in this course, within a few months you’ll always be able to ask for what you want, share yourself openly and honestly, and feel confident talking to anyone.


“A high-quality course that explains the inner workings that lead to feelings of rejection. By following this course and doing the prescribed exercises, anyone should be able to overcome their fear of rejection.”

  • Ash Dando


Dan Munro is a bestselling author who has been coaching students for almost 10 years, after a career spent rehabilitating serious criminal offenders. He’s helped 1000s overcome their fear of rejection by helping them build a confident mindset and powerful philosophy that gives them the courage to go for what they want, no matter what.

This course represents all the knowledge and tools he has learned and successfully applied to his clients and his own personal growth as a coach, father, husband, and friend.

Enroll now at no risk! The Overcome Your Fear of Rejection… Permanently! course includes a 30-day money-back guarantee! Learn how to stop fearing and deal with rejection today.
targetAudiences: Anyone afraid of rejection and loneliness
Shy and anxious people
People that get scared or nervous in social situations
People struggling with forming good relationships and friendships
People stuck in their career because they’re afraid of trying something new
Anyone that wants to live with more confidence and integrity

courseDetails.title: Ellenpont és akkord
courseDetails.shortDescription: Egy egyszerű, hatékony MÓDSZER a többszólamú zene megismeréséhez
courseDetails.longDescription:
Fedezd fel a többszólamú zene és zeneelmélet megértésének kulcsát, és győzd le az ellenpont és akkordelmélet elleni előítéletedet.

A videótanfolyam során egy hatékony MÓDSZERREL nyerhetsz betekintést a többszólamú zenébe, az ellenpont és az akkordok világába.

Egy rendhagyó tanfolyam, amellyel egyszerű és érthető módon fedezheted fel a többszólamú zene szabályait.

Ez a tanfolyam eltér a szokásos zeneelméleti tanfolyamoktól.
Röviden és tömören fogalmaz, minden logikusan és szisztematikusan van felépítve, minden mondat és rajz a könnyebb megértést és begyakorlást szolgálja.

Segít mélyen és alaposan megérteni a többszólamú zenét és az ellenpontos módszert, megismerve annak előnyeit és szabályait.

Mindez praktikusan lesz elmagyarázva számos infografika, animáció és hangpélda által. Ezek egyszerű és érthető módon mutatják be, hogyan tudod használni a megadott szabályokat és hogy konkrétan mit is kell tenned.

A szabályok a gyakorlatban lépésről lépésre alkalmazhatóak, tehát azonnal aktívan zenélve gyakorlatba is vezethetőek.
Minden elméleti rész után egy egyszerű feladatot kell elvégezned, ez hidat teremt a szabályok és gyakorlat között.

Ez a tanfolyam tartalmazza azokat a készségeket és információkat, amelyekre szükséged van az ellenpont sikeres elsajátításához.
Az ellenpont egyszerű, praktikus módszer több szólam létrehozására és vezetésére.

A tanfolyam célja: Több szólam szerkesztése, vezetése és az akkordok kreatív használata.

Alig kapsz más lehetőséget arra, hogy ilyen könnyen, de átfogóan megtanuld az ellenpontot, az akkordokat és a kompozíciót.

Johann Fux osztrák zeneszerző kiváló meglátásai képezik ennek a metódusnak, az "ellenpont-elméletnek" az alapjait. Ez az értékes tudás, a többszólamú zenéről, válik elérhetővé számodra ezen a tanfolyamon.

A többszólamú zene megértésének legegyszerűbb és legbiztonságosabb módja annak megértése, hogy milyen kapcsolat jön létre a hangok között és ezek hogyan alakítanak dallamot.

Miután megértetted ezeket a fogalmakat, megértheted, hogy miért így épül fel a többszólamú zene.

Ha ezt már ismered és megértetted, akkor akár saját szólamokat is szerezhetsz!

Mindegy, hogy már ismered az akkordelméletet, vagy éppen most kezded el tanulni, ez a kurzus a te számodra is a legmegfelelőbb lehetőségeket nyújtja..

Ez a tanfolyam az ellenpontról valószínűleg a legegyszerűbb és egyben leghatékonyabb tanulási módszert is tartalmazza, amely jelenleg létezik.

A zenei sikered a saját kezedben van.

Kezdj neki most a tanfolyamnak!
targetAudiences: Aktiv zenekedvelők akik meg akarják ismerni a többszólamú zene, az ellenpont és az akkordok szabályait.

courseDetails.title: Master Course in Sustainable Technologies & Datafication 2.0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Sustainable Technologies, Datafication, Circular Economy, Sustainability, Innovation and Entrepreneurship, IT Business
courseDetails.longDescription:
Master Course in Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0: Shaping a Greener Future

In today's rapidly changing world, the integration of technology and data-driven solutions plays a pivotal role in addressing the most pressing global challenges, including climate change and environmental sustainability. The Master Course in Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0 represents a cutting-edge educational program designed to equip students with the knowledge and skills needed to harness the power of technology and data for a more sustainable and eco-friendly future. In this master course, we will explore the key aspects of this master course and why it is so relevant in our modern world.

The Need for Sustainable Tech & Datafication

Climate change, resource depletion, and the loss of biodiversity are critical issues that demand immediate attention and action. The Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0 master course recognizes that technology and data-driven approaches are instrumental in mitigating and reversing the environmental damage caused by human activities.

The Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0 master course is a comprehensive program that encompasses a wide range of subjects, ensuring that students are well-prepared for the challenges of today's rapidly changing world. Here are some of the key components:

1. Data Analytics: Understanding and working with large datasets is a fundamental skill. Students learn to gather, clean, and analyze data to make informed decisions about sustainability initiatives.

2. Environmental Science: A strong foundation in environmental science is essential for understanding the context and urgency of sustainability. Students gain insights into ecosystems, climate change, and conservation.

3. Renewable Energy: The course delves into the world of sustainable energy sources, covering solar, wind, and hydroelectric power, as well as energy storage and grid integration.

4. Environmental Policy: A strong grasp of policy and regulation is vital in today's environmental landscape. Students explore how to navigate and influence policy for a greener future.

5. Data Security and Privacy: As data becomes more critical in sustainability, it's important to learn how to protect it. The course includes a focus on data security and privacy in a sustainable tech context.

6. Practical Projects: Hands-on experience is crucial. Students work on real-world projects that address sustainability challenges, from designing energy-efficient buildings to developing sustainable agricultural systems.

Career Opportunities

Upon completing the Master Course in Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0, graduates are well-equipped to pursue a variety of exciting career paths:

1. Sustainability Consultant: Help organizations and governments implement sustainable practices, reducing their environmental impact.

2. Data Analyst/Scientist: Analyze and interpret data to drive sustainable decision-making in various industries.

3. Renewable Energy Engineer: Design and optimize renewable energy systems for homes, businesses, and cities.

4. Environmental Policy Analyst: Shape policies and regulations that promote sustainability at local, national, and international levels.

5. Green Tech Startup Entrepreneur: Create innovative solutions to address sustainability challenges and drive positive change.

The Master Course in Sustainable Tech & Datafication 2.0 is a forward-thinking program that prepares students to tackle the most pressing environmental challenges of our time. In a world where data and technology are omnipresent, this course provides the tools and knowledge needed to shape a greener and more sustainable future. Whether you're a recent graduate looking to make a difference or a professional seeking to pivot into a more sustainable career, this course could be your stepping stone to success in the rapidly evolving field of sustainable technology and datafication. Embrace the future of sustainability and be part of the solution.

In this master course, I would like to teach the 7 major topics:

1. Sustainable Technology Fundamentals

2. Advanced Datafication Techniques

3. Ethics and Sustainability

4. Sustainable Tech Applications

5. Data-Driven Decision-Making for Sustainability

courseDetails.title: Media Training for Beginners: Ace Your First News Interviews

courseDetails.longDescription:
Imagine yourself confidently answering a reporter's questions, knowing that you are going to get the exact messages and quotes you want in the final news story. You can give interviews right now, with the same skill as someone who has done thousands of interviews over decades.

Media Training for Beginners covers every aspect of speaking to the news media. Even if you have never been interviewed before, you can quickly gain the confidence you need to get your message across, after completing this course. TJ Walker is an internationally renowned media trained with more than 30 years of experience. He will teach you how to do four things: 1. Look comfortable on camera. 2. Prepare media messages. 3. Answer questions strategically and 4. Speak in sound bites.

After spending four hours in this course, you will learn how to be successful in any interview. You do not have to learn in front of the whole world during a real interview. The time to learn media do's and don'ts is now before your next interview takes place.

This course will give you step-by-step instructions on how to prepare and practice for any media interview, talk show appearance, or interaction with a reporter. Course Full Description and Welcome Letter: Executive Program in Business Administration

This course is designed for beginners and for the ones who already have an experience in management, and, of course, for anyone who is interested in management or has their own production business. This course is effective not only for managers, but also for the CEOs, heads of departments, etc. The course could help to improve your managerial skills and also to create annual company plan, budgets and effectively set organizational goals.


This course contains basic and academic knowledge and instruments of administrative management or business administration. Also, here you can find interesting tools and, for example, different types of organizational structures.


All this information will help you to gain more confidence in your position as a manager or CEO.


The Executive Program in Business Administration is a comprehensive and intensive course designed to equip professionals with the essential knowledge and skills required for effective administrative management in a business environment. This program covers a wide range of topics that are crucial for individuals aspiring to build successful careers or establish their own businesses.


Administrative Management: This topic explores the fundamental principles and practices of administrative management, including decision-making, problem-solving, and effective communication within an organization. Participants learn how to streamline processes, improve productivity, and foster a positive work culture.


The Essence of Business Administration: This module delves into the core concepts and theories that underpin business administration. It focuses on the key functions of management, such as planning, organizing, leading, and controlling, and how they contribute to the overall success of an organization.


Management of Material and Human Resources: This topic addresses the crucial aspects of managing both material resources (e.g., inventory, supplies) and human resources (e.g., recruitment, training, performance evaluation). Participants gain insights into effective resource allocation, talent management, and enhancing employee productivity.


Organizational Structure and Synchronization of Departments: This module examines the design and implementation of organizational structures and explores strategies for coordinating and synchronizing different departments within an organization. Participants learn how to optimize communication and collaboration across teams to achieve organizational goals.


Project Management: This topic introduces participants to the principles and practices of project management, emphasizing the planning, execution, and control of projects. It covers the advantages and disadvantages of project management, various project management methodologies, and techniques for managing risks and stakeholders.


Goal Setting and Planning in Organization: This module focuses on the importance of setting clear goals and developing effective plans to achieve them. Participants learn how to create actionable plans, align goals with organizational objectives, and monitor progress towards achieving desired outcomes.


Ethics of Business: This topic explores the ethical dimensions of business administration and highlights the significance of ethical decision-making and responsible business practices. Participants gain an understanding of ethical frameworks and learn how to navigate complex ethical dilemmas in the business world.


Business Logistics: This module addresses the management of the flow of goods and services within a business. It covers topics such as supply chain management, inventory control, transportation, and distribution. Participants learn how to optimize logistics processes to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction.


Organizational Development Management: This topic focuses on strategies and techniques for managing organizational change and development. Participants gain insights into the importance of adapting to evolving market dynamics, fostering innovation, and building a resilient and agile organization.


Importance of Business Administration for Building a Career and Own Business:


Understanding the principles and practices of business administration is vital for individuals seeking to build successful careers or establish their own businesses. Here's why:


Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.


Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.


Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.


Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.


Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.


Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.


Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.


Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.


In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.

  • CEO

Effective Decision-Making: Business administration equips individuals with the skills to make informed and strategic decisions. This ability is crucial for career advancement as well as entrepreneurial success.

Resource Management: Efficient management of material and human resources is essential for optimizing productivity and achieving business objectives. Business administration provides individuals with the knowledge and tools to effectively allocate and utilize resources.

Organizational Efficiency: By understanding organizational structures and synchronization of departments, individuals can enhance efficiency, streamline processes, and foster a cohesive work environment. These skills are valuable for both career growth and business success.

Project Management: Proficiency in project management is highly sought after in today's dynamic business environment. It allows individuals to effectively plan, execute, and deliver projects, leading to successful outcomes and increased opportunities.

Strategic Planning: The ability to set goals, create actionable plans, and execute them is crucial for career progression and entrepreneurial success. Business administration equips individuals with the skills to develop strategic plans that align with organizational objectives.

Ethical Decision-Making: Ethics play a significant role in business today. Understanding the ethical dimensions of business administration enables individuals to make responsible decisions, maintain integrity, and build trust with stakeholders.

Logistics and Supply Chain Management: Efficient management of business logistics is vital for meeting customer demands and maintaining a competitive edge. Proficiency in logistics and supply chain management enhances career prospects and ensures smooth operations in one's own business.

Organizational Development: The ability to manage organizational change and foster development is critical for career growth and entrepreneurial success. Business administration provides individuals with the skills to adapt to market dynamics and drive organizational growth.

In conclusion, the Executive Program in Business Administration covers a wide range of essential topics that are vital for individuals seeking career advancement or planning to establish their own businesses. By acquiring knowledge and skills in these areas, participants can enhance their professional capabilities and increase their chances of success in the dynamic and competitive business landscape.

courseDetails.title: Aprende JavaScript de CERO a EXPERTO

courseDetails.longDescription:
JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación ligero, interpretado o compilado justo a tiempo, con funciones de primera clase. Aunque es más conocido como lenguaje de scripting para páginas web, muchos entornos ajenos a los navegadores también lo utilizan, como Node.js, Apache CouchDB y Adobe Acrobat. JavaScript es un lenguaje basado en prototipos, multiparadigma, monohilo y dinámico, que admite estilos orientados a objetos, imperativos y declarativos (por ejemplo, programación funcional).

JavaScript es el lenguaje de programación más popular del mundo. Junto con HTML (que se utiliza para la estructura de la página web), y CSS (que se utiliza para el estilo); JavaScript (que se utiliza para la funcionalidad), se considera uno de los lenguajes fundamentales para el desarrollo web. Aun así, JavaScript está en todas partes, ya no es un lenguaje exclusivo de la web, podemos encontrárnoslo en los servidores, en las aplicaciones escritorio multiplataforma,  y en muchos otros ámbitos. Por lo tanto, saber programar en JavaScript puede ofrecer grandes oportunidades laborales.

Este curso de JavaScript te llevará desde principiante hasta profesional. Este curso está diseñado desde la perspectiva de un estudiante que no tiene conocimientos previos de programación y que es un principiante en JavaScript. Además, está definido de una forma en la que se va de los aspectos más básicos a los más complejos, para que el alumno pueda ir adquiriendo las bases de la programación en JavaScript de la mejor manera posible.

Entre los contenidos de este curso se encuentran los siguientes:

  • Sintaxis básica de JavaScript

  • Variables y tipos de datos

  • Trabajar con variables de texto

  • Trabajar con variables numéricas

  • Estructuras de datos

  • Sentencias condicionales

  • Bucles iterativos

  • Declaración de funciones

  • Programación Orientada a Objetos

Por lo tanto, a lo largo de este completo curso, cubrimos una gran cantidad de habilidades y técnicas que incluyen las aspectos más esenciales para programar en JavaScript y en cualquier otro lenguaje de programación.

Al realizar este curso, te convertirás en un programador de JavaScript fluido y serás tan bueno que podrás conseguir una oferta de trabajo razonable como desarrollador de JavaScript y utilizar el lenguaje profesionalmente.
targetAudiences: Este curso está dirigido a cualquier persona que esté interesada en aprender a programar con JavaScript

courseDetails.title: Aprende HTML5 y CSS3 de CERO a EXPERTO
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende HTML y CSS sin ningún conocimiento previo
courseDetails.longDescription:
HTML es un lenguaje de marcación que sirve para definir el contenido de las páginas web. Se compone en base a etiquetas, también llamadas marcas o tags, con las cuales conseguimos expresar las partes de un documento, cabecera, cuerpo, encabezados, párrafos, etc. En definitiva, el contenido de una página web.

HTML es el primer lenguaje que debe aprender cualquier persona interesada en construir un sitio web. A partir de HTML podemos pasar a muchos otros lenguajes interesantes que sirven para hacer cosas diversas y más avanzadas. Es decir, sea cual sea la tecnología, herramienta o gestor de contenido que nos hayamos propuesto aprender, o que tengamos que usar en nuestro día a día, HTML siempre será el lenguaje en el que toda web se construye y, por tanto, es de obligado conocimiento para todos.

CSS son las siglas en inglés de Cascading Style Sheets, que significa "hojas de estilo en cascada". Es un lenguaje que se usa para estilizar elementos escritos en un lenguaje de marcado como HTML. Este lenguaje fue desarrollado por W3C (World Wide Web Consortium) en 1996 por una razón muy sencilla. HTML no fue diseñado para tener etiquetas que ayuden a formatear la página. Está hecho solo para escribir el marcado para el sitio.

HTML y CSS son dos de los lenguajes de programación más populares del mundo. Junto con JavaScript (que se utiliza para la funcionalidad), HTML (que se utiliza para la estructura de la página web), y CSS (que se utiliza para el estilo), se consideran dos de los lenguajes fundamentales para el desarrollo web.

Aprender HTML y CSS es sencillo. En pocos días o semanas serás capaz de entender y usar las etiquetas más comunes y componer documentos HTML (páginas web) correctas, y usar los selectores y propiedades más comunes y crear tus propias hojas de estilos con CSS. Aquí encontrarás muchas ayudas para poder dar esos primeros pasos y luego profundizar en cualquier área que necesites.

La relación entre HTML y CSS es muy fuerte. Dado que HTML es un lenguaje de marcado (es decir, constituye la base de un sitio) y CSS enfatiza el estilo (toda la parte estética de un sitio web), van de la mano. CSS no es técnicamente una necesidad, pero no querrás tener un sitio que solo tenga HTML, ya que se vería completamente desnudo.

Este curso de HTML y CSS te llevará desde principiante hasta profesional. Este curso está diseñado desde la perspectiva de un estudiante que no tiene conocimientos previos de programación y que es un principiante en HTML y CSS. Además, está definido de una forma en la que se va de los aspectos más básicos a los más complejos, para que el alumno pueda ir adquiriendo las bases de la programación en HTML de la mejor manera posible, y posteriormente aplique diferentes estilos mediante CSS.

Entre los contenidos de este curso se encuentran los siguientes:

  • Sintaxis básica de HTML

  • Elementos y atributos básicos de HTML

  • Tablas con HTML

  • Listas con HTML

  • Archivos multimedia con HTML

  • Elementos y atributos avanzados de HTML

  • Formularios con HTML

  • Aspectos básicos de CSS

  • Box model en CSS

  • Modificación de textos en CSS

  • Fondos, gradientes y sombras con CSS

  • Disposición y visualización de elementos con CSS

  • Selectores avanzados de CSS

  • Modificación de elementos con CSS

Por lo tanto, a lo largo de este completo curso, cubrimos una gran cantidad de habilidades y técnicas que incluyen las aspectos más esenciales para desarrollo web con HTML y el diseño web con CSS.

Al realizar este curso, te convertirás en un programador de HTML y CSS fluido y serás tan bueno que podrás conseguir una oferta de trabajo razonable como desarrollador o diseñador con HTML y CSS, y utilizar los lenguaje profesionalmente.
targetAudiences: Este curso está dirigido a cualquier persona que esté interesada en aprender desarrollo y diseño web con HTML y CSS

In this course we will discuss GSM System in details

The Global System for Mobile Communications (GSM) is a standard developed by the European Telecommunications Standards Institute (ETSI) to describe the protocols for second-generation (2G) digital cellular networks used by mobile devices such as mobile phones and tablets. It was first deployed in Finland in December 1991. By the mid-2010s, it became a global standard for mobile communications achieving over 90% market share, and operating in over 193 countries and territories.

Course will cover basics, Network elements, Air interface and protocols

courseDetails.title: OOP Design Patterns in Python
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn more about Object Orientated Programming
courseDetails.longDescription:
Design patterns provide a vocabulary to discuss problems and solutions with a common context. They are used in Object Orientated Programs. They’re the recipe or instructions, and once you’ve read them, you’ll be able to more easily follow any piece of code that uses them.

Many software developers first encounter design patterns when they study computer science in college or at university. This typically happens in the second year, after students learn about object-oriented programming and related topics such as inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.

This is a good time to start learning about patterns because it will help you to get more out of the rest of your coursework.

However, not all professional developers learn about design patterns in their formal education. Some don't have the opportunity to learn about patterns at all. The experience of many developers is that design patterns emerge from on-the-job training and experience with projects of increasing size and complexity.

In this course we explain Object Orientated Design Patterns with Python through examples. It includes the factory method, command pattern and many others. All Python source code is included in the course so you can study at your own pace, the videos explain them in more details.
targetAudiences: Intermediate Python programmers who want to learn more

Most courses online aim to be comprehensive with over 10+ hours of video lectures. This can be intimidating for someone who wants to work with Laravel for the first time.  Moreover, consuming 10+ hours of videos is not easy. On most occasions, you'll simply abandon the course without ever getting to the interesting parts. I know it because I have experienced it. This is very sad because Laravel is such an easy framework to get started with Web development. I fell in love with web development after I started using Laravel.

That is why I designed this course where you'll learn Just Enough Laravel to get started with web development.  We'll build an app from scratch and I'll take you through all the key features Laravel provides to build an application quickly. Some of the key objectives we are going to cover in this course are:


  • How to setup an environment for Laravel development

  • How to build your first Laravel app

  • How to manage tables in the database using migrations

  • How to access tables through Eloquent Models

  • Understanding the flow a Laravel application

  • Gain knowledge about routes and resource controller

  • How to implement CRUD operations

  • How blade works

  • How to implement Authentication for our app

  • Relationships between the models

  • Seeding the database and much more

This course was intentionally kept concise and by no means it is a comprehensive course but from my experience, once you get the hang of it, you will learn new and difficult concepts as you face challenges regarding them. Moreover, it is unwise to burden your brain with things that you won't need right now.
targetAudiences: This course is for students and aspiring developers who want to learn web development as quickly and easily as possible.

courseDetails.title: Ethical Hacking: Pentesting Tools
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Popular Hacking Tools and Crack Passwords
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hacking is an art, a science, and a passion for many people. Hacking, or as it is called in some circles, pentesting and white hat hacking, is simply the art of testing a system or product to find vulnerabilities.

This course is about penetration testing tools. A penetration tool is a program or script used to break into a computer system or network.

A white hat hacker, also known as an ethical hacker, is a computer security expert who specializes in penetration testing and finding vulnerabilities in systems. A black hat hacker, on the other hand, is a person who breaks into computers with malicious intent. White hat hackers use their skills to improve security by finding and exposing vulnerabilities before black hat hackers can exploit them.

One of the most important aspects of white hat hacking is penetration testing, which is used to find security weaknesses in systems.

Penetration testing tools are essential for any ethical hacker. In this course you will learn about various pentesting tools such as burp, hydra, nmap and others. By the end of this course you will be able to use these tools to find vulnerabilities in systems. You will learn how to crack passwords, how to find services to exploit and more.
targetAudiences: Beginner Ethical Hackers

courseDetails.title: Ethical Hacking: Weaponization
courseDetails.shortDescription: Hack using Office Douments
courseDetails.longDescription:
A hacker can simply break into a system to show that it is vulnerable, or he can be so mischievous that he wants to hold or maintain a connection in the background without the user's knowledge. This can happen with Trojan horses, rootkits, or other malicious files. The goal is to maintain access to the target until he completes the tasks he intends to perform in that target.

Cyber ​​attacks are not to be taken lightly. It doesn't matter if you have the most secure firewall in the world; every step in the cyber kill chain reduces your security and leads to breaches of your network. That's why it's so important to know how to spot an attack when it happens -- or ideally, stop it in the first place.

In this course you will learn how you can hack a computer using an office document and also using an html application. You'll learn how to create a reverse shell giving you complete access over the computer. You will be able to launch a reverse shell as soon as the user opens the office document. You will learn about metasploit too, a tool that is often used in computer hacking. You will learn how to use the metasploit console and use it to create a reverse shell.

This is a beginners course, you don't need any prior knowledge but some computer knowledge like Linux basics and networking is recommended.
targetAudiences: Beginner Ethical Hackers

courseDetails.title: Redis Database Tutorial
courseDetails.shortDescription: redis commands for beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Redis database is a networked, in-memory, key-value database. It uses a different paradigm than the commonly use SQL database systems.

The Redis database can store diverse kinds of data (strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets, bitmaps), and support different kinds of operations (hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets, bitmaps) on the data.

It is written in ANSI C and can be used on all major operating systems. The Redis database has been running since December 2007 and in the last 5 years it has been downloaded more than 1.5 million times.

As a developer, I have used Redis on a number of projects. It is an excellent choice for projects that require ultra-fast data access. Redis is in-memory, which means that it stores all its data in memory, so writing to Redis is fast. Since memory is so much faster than disk access, this means that Redis' data access is very efficient.

In this course you will learn how to use the Redis database, how to install it, and many other options. It is a course for beginners, no prior knowledge about databases is required. You will learn how to use the redis command line interface and a lot more.
targetAudiences: Developers that want to learn to use the Redis database
Developers that want to learn a new paradigm besides SQL databases

courseDetails.title: Linux System Administration (Part-1) (Hindi | हिंदी)

Linux is everywhere: in every industry and on most of the devices (from servers to smart watches). Agriculture, Business, Computer Sciences, Earth Sciences, Film and Media Industry and Natural Sciences, no matter which industry you belong to, you have to deal with a Linux system every now and then. There is a misconception about Linux that "it is difficult to learn". The reason for this misconception is that the Linux has a certain way of doing things which are different from other operating systems (namely Windows). In order to be familiar with Linux, a person has to learn the way it operates. Therefore, this course is designed in such a way that it teaches the working of Linux in a very easy and familiar way.

Linux System Administration (Part-1) is the most comprehensive course in Hindi (हिंदी) and Urdu (اردو) languages which teaches the basics of Linux operating system. This course will build a foundation, upon which a participant can progress to become an experienced Linux System Administrator. This is the Part-1 of the three-part series, which deals with the important Linux theoretical concepts and basic file operations. Upon the completion of this course, the participant will learn the following topics.


Course Contents:

  • Source code and types of softwares with respect to source code

  • Software licenses: Concept, types and characteristics

  • The GNU Project and its relation with Linux

  • What is Linux and Kernel? Its types and release schedule

  • What is a Linux distribution? Its types, characteristics and layout

  • Relationship between Linux and a Distribution

  • Selection process of a Linux distribution for a beginner

  • Linux Shells and Terminals

  • Types of Linux Shells, their characteristics, and ways to access them

  • Linux Directory Structure (File Hierarchy Structure)

  • Structure and synopsis of Linux commands

  • Creation of a Linux Virtual Machine

  • Directory navigation with "cd" command

  • Files and directory listing with "ls" command

  • Using wildcard characters in commands

  • Commands: pwd, clear and reset

  • File viewers: cat, less, more, head, tail

  • Creation of files with "touch" command

  • Creation of directories with "mkdir" command

  • File and directory deletion with "rm" command

  • Copy/Paste files and directories with "cp" command

  • Move/Cut/Paste files and directories with "mv" command

  • Creation and removal of shortcuts with "ln" command

  • Text display with "echo" command

  • Comparison of files with "diff" command

  • User identification with "id" command

  • Text editors: "vi" and "nano"

  • User monitoring

courseDetails.title: R Programming for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: R Programming course for newbies. R installation, data types, statements, functions, conditions, packages, data frames.
courseDetails.longDescription:
A warm welcome to the R Programming for Beginners course by Uplatz.


R is a programming language regularly used for arithmetical computing and graphical demonstration to examine and visualize data. R is a software environment which is used to analyze numerical data and graphical representation. R lets us to do sectional programming using functions. R programming language was named R, founded on the first name letter of the two authors - Robert Gentleman and Ross Ihaka. An overall understanding of R should cover topics such as introduction, features, installation, RStudio ide, variables, datatypes, operators, if statement, vector, data handing, graphics, statistical modelling, etc. R not only allows us to do branching and looping but also allows to do modular programming using functions. R allows integration with the procedures written in the C, C++, .NET, Python, and FORTRAN languages to improve efficiency.

R is one of the most significant instrument which is used by investigators, data analyst, statisticians, and marketers for retrieving, cleaning, analyzing, visualizing, and presenting data. R is available for Linux, MacOS, and Windows. R's binary and logical operators will look very acquainted to programmers. R can be used to compute a large variety of classical statistic tests. With R, it’s also possible to perform classification analysis such as Principal component analysis and clustering. Many types of graphs can be drawn using R, including, box plot, histogram, density curve, scatter plot, line plot, bar plot, etc.


R Programming for Beginners - Course Syllabus

  1. Introduction to R Language

  2. R Installation

  3. R Data Structures

  4. R Data Types

  5. R Packages

  6. Simple Calculator using R

  7. R as a Calculator

  8. Condition Statements in R

  9. Looping in R

  10. Repeat Statement in R

  11. Sum of N Natural Numbers

  12. Sum Recursion

  13. Switch Statement in R

  14. Data Pre-processing

  15. Functions in R

  16. Factors in R

  17. Data frames in R

  18. Data Reshaping

  19. R Math built-in Functions

  20. Melting and Casting in R

courseDetails.title: Master Matillion: ETL & Cloud Data Integration for Success
courseDetails.shortDescription: Matillion Essentials: Build ETL Solutions with Confidence, ETL Bootcamp, Matillion Associate Certification Exam Prep.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Matillion Mastery: ETL and Cloud Data Integration Excellence

In today's data-driven landscape, the ability to efficiently extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from diverse sources is crucial for organizations and data professionals. Matillion, a robust ETL platform, has gained prominence for its capabilities in data integration and transformation. "Master Matillion: ETL & Cloud Data Integration for Success" is a comprehensive course that provides participants with the knowledge and skills necessary to become proficient in Matillion. This course takes learners on a journey from understanding Matillion's architecture to implementing best practices for data integration and transformation.

Matillion is a cloud-native data integration platform designed for organizations to efficiently extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from various sources into a data warehouse or data lake. It is a powerful tool used for data integration and transformation, making it easier for businesses to consolidate and analyze their data for better decision-making.

The course encompasses a wide array of topics, offering a comprehensive exploration of Matillion's features, components, and projects. It equips participants to connect to various data sources, construct data pipelines, and perform effective data transformations. Students will also learn optimization techniques and troubleshooting methods to enhance their Matillion workflows. By the end of this course, participants will have a strong foundation in Matillion and the ability to confidently create, manage, and optimize ETL processes.

Key Highlights:

  • Understanding Matillion: The course commences with an introduction to Matillion, highlighting its significance in the ETL landscape and its key features that set it apart.

  • Matillion Architecture: Participants will delve into the core components of Matillion, understand the concept of instances, and learn how to manage projects effectively.

  • Data Integration: The course covers data sources and connectivity, data pipeline creation, and data transformation within Matillion, allowing participants to streamline data processes efficiently.

  • Data Transformation: Participants will gain a deep understanding of Matillion's transformation components, including data filtering, cleansing, aggregation, and grouping, ensuring data quality and accuracy.

  • Data Loading Strategies: The course explores various strategies for data loading, including managing data loading jobs and efficiently handling incremental data loads.

  • Monitoring and Optimization: Participants will learn how to monitor Matillion jobs, optimize performance, and troubleshoot common issues, ensuring the smooth operation of data processes.

  • Matillion Best Practices: The course imparts valuable insights into ETL best practices, security and access control, and backup and recovery strategies, enabling participants to maintain data integrity and secure their data processes.

Matillion is widely used by data professionals, data engineers, and analysts to simplify the data integration process, reduce development time, and accelerate the delivery of data insights. Its cloud-native architecture makes it particularly well-suited for organizations looking to harness the power of cloud computing for their data integration needs.

Upon completing this course, participants will possess the expertise to effectively utilize Matillion for ETL and data integration. They will be equipped to streamline data workflows, maintain data quality, and make informed decisions based on their data.

Join us on an educational journey to unlock the full potential of Matillion and master the art of ETL and data integration. Prepare to transform raw data into valuable insights and elevate your data-driven decision-making skills with "Matillion Mastery: ETL and Cloud Data Integration Excellence."

Thank you.

This course is not intended to replace studying any official vendor material for certification exams, is not endorsed by the certification vendor, and you will not be getting the official certification study material or a voucher as a part of this  course.

courseDetails.title: Professional Agile Leadership PAL I Certification Essentials

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the Comprehensive "Professional Agile Leadership PAL I Certification Essentials" course!

Professional Agile Leadership (PAL I) Certification is a certification program offered by Scrum, an organization dedicated to improving the profession of software delivery through a comprehensive series of assessments and certifications. PAL I is one of the certifications in their portfolio and focuses on the role of leadership in an agile organization.

Professional Agile Leadership I (PAL I) is a certification course designed to equip individuals with the knowledge and skills necessary to lead Agile transformations and foster Agile practices within organizations. It is targeted at leaders, managers, and executives who are responsible for driving Agile adoption and supporting Agile teams.

The course focuses on developing Agile leadership competencies, including understanding the Agile mindset, principles, and values, leading Agile teams effectively, creating a culture of trust and collaboration, and facilitating Agile decision-making. Participants will gain insights into various Agile frameworks and methodologies, such as Scrum, and learn how to scale Agile practices across the organization.

PAL I also addresses the role of Agile leaders in organizational change management, helping participants understand the challenges and strategies involved in successful Agile transformations. The course covers topics like change management, organizational agility, and Agile governance.

Throughout the PAL I course, participants will engage in interactive learning activities, case studies, and discussions to deepen their understanding of Agile leadership principles and practices. They will learn practical techniques for leading Agile teams, fostering collaboration, and driving continuous improvement.

By completing the PAL I course, participants will be prepared to take the PAL I certification exam, which validates their understanding of Agile leadership concepts and their ability to apply Agile principles in real-world scenarios. PAL I certification demonstrates an individual's competence in Agile leadership and signifies their readiness to guide organizations on the path to Agile success.

In summary, the PAL I course provides a comprehensive foundation in Agile leadership, empowering leaders to drive Agile transformations, nurture high-performing teams, and create an environment conducive to Agile excellence. It equips participants with the knowledge, skills, and certification necessary to lead Agile initiatives and promote a culture of continuous improvement and adaptability within their organizations.

Key topics covered in the PAL I certification include:

  1. Understanding Agile and Scrum: This certification provides an overview of the Agile methodology and Scrum framework, which are widely used in software development and project management.

  2. The Role of Leadership: It delves into the responsibilities and challenges that leaders face when implementing and sustaining Agile practices in their organizations.

  3. Agile Culture: PAL I focuses on creating a culture of collaboration, transparency, and continuous improvement within an organization.

  4. Servant Leadership: The certification explores the concept of servant leadership, where leaders support and empower their teams rather than traditional command-and-control approaches.

  5. Organizational Change: PAL I addresses the challenges and strategies for bringing about organizational change in alignment with Agile principles.

PAL I is designed for leaders, executives, and managers who want to understand and support the adoption of agile principles and practices within their organizations. It aims to equip leaders with the knowledge and skills necessary to lead and guide agile transformations effectively.

So, I hope to see you in this Professional Agile Leadership I (PAL I) course.

Thank you.
